divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking upstairs and looked out a large window where the stairs turned at the halfway point. I saw a multi color lighted saucer shaped thing hovering silently just 10-15 feet away. It was no more than 1.5 feet in diameter. I thought someoneone had a neat remote controlled flying saucer. I watched it when suddenly it flew away at a high rate of speed, faster than what seemed possible. I remember watching it fly several several blocks thinking that where I perceived it to be, at this distance, I shouldn't be able to see it anymore. It also may have appeared grey at this distance. Then it was gone. I sat there thinking did this just happen? What was this? The moment was gone, and I wished I could have it back, it was just too strange.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
